Class ReportDAO

java.lang.Object
database.ReportDAO
public class ReportDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for generating various business reports from the database. Provides methods to retrieve sales, category, and customer analytics data used in reports and charts.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    ReportDAO.ZReportData
    Represents structured data for the end-of-day Z-Report summary.

  • Method Details

    • getItemRevenueBetween

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Data<String,Number>> getItemRevenueBetween(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Retrieves total revenue generated by each menu item between two dates. Used for displaying item performance within a selected date range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date of the time range
      endDate - the end date (inclusive) of the time range
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of XYChart.Data representing item names and their corresponding revenue

    • getOrdersByMonth

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Data<String,Number>> getOrdersByMonth()
      Retrieves the number of orders placed per month for the past 12 months.
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of XYChart.Data containing month labels and order counts

    • getCategoryRevenue

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Data<String,Number>> getCategoryRevenue()
      Calculates total revenue by category across all transactions.
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of XYChart.Data representing each category and its total revenue

    • getRewardsPieChart

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<javafx.scene.chart.PieChart.Data> getRewardsPieChart()
      Retrieves a comparison of rewards vs. non-rewards customers for a pie chart visualization.
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of PieChart.Data containing counts of both customer types

    • getXReport

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Data<String,Number>> getXReport()
      Generates an hourly sales breakdown for the current day (X-Report). Used for real-time dashboard visualization of sales performance throughout the day.
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of XYChart.Data representing hours and corresponding sales

    • getZReport

      public ReportDAO.ZReportData getZReport()
      Generates a comprehensive end-of-day summary report (Z-Report), including total sales, tax, payment breakdowns, and employee participation.
      Returns:
      a ReportDAO.ZReportData object containing aggregated daily metrics

    • resetDailyTotals

      public boolean resetDailyTotals()
      Placeholder for resetting daily totals after the Z-Report has been generated. In production systems, this may archive or clear data.
      Returns:
      true after reset operation completes
